content: I agree that firearm safety education should start at a young age. teaching children and young adults about the proper handling and storage of firearms can help prevent accidents and promote responsible gun ownership. programs that offer such education can also provide an opportunity to discuss the risks and consequences of gun violence, which can help prevent dangerous behavior. however, it is important to ensure that these educational programs are based on safe, proven guidelines and are appropriately tailored to the age and experience of the audience.
